title: Aesthetic Experience and Practical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Through Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and experience in applying mathematical thinking to everyday life
context.additional_context: A structure enabling self-directed inquiry in asynchronous learning environments, emphasizing the cultivation of applied mathematical skills to improve workplace efficiency for employees

learning_goals: Complete at least three projects where learners apply mathematical concepts to solve real-world workplace problems (e.g., budget allocation, data analysis)
Write reflective journals at least ten times recognizing the beauty and wonder of mathematics through interactive content provided on an online learning platform
Compare and analyze at least five mathematical problem-solving strategies through asynchronous discussions with peer learners
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
